name: llmnet
observations: LLM pipeline orchestration CLI tool written in Rust
Secrets system supports env-file, env, and vault sources (src/config/secrets.rs)
Functions system supports REST, Shell, WebSocket, gRPC types (src/config/functions.rs)
Hooks system with pre/post execution, observe/transform modes (src/runtime/hooks.rs)
Hook integration tests with thin HTTP servers (tests/hooks_integration.rs)
Rustbook documentation deployed to GitHub Pages at avarok-cybersecurity.github.io/llmnet
Book source in docs/book/ with 27 chapters covering all features
